class_notes: (Prior completion of QTM 100 and PSYC 200W) (Students who enroll in this class without these pre-requisites will be removed administratively without notice. Please adhere to the class enrollment requirements)
course_description: This course provides an introduction to advanced statistics and the research questions and designs that require their use. Topics include mediation and moderation in multiple regression, complex ANOVA, data reduction techniques, multivariate ANOVA, advanced regression, and resampling methods.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in New Psyc Bldg 361 (36 Eagle Ro
